there's canals and then that also leads

man-made but I think most of them are
natural maybe a mix but that's what the
kerala backwaters is and for the
houseboats as the history goes this area
has been massive for trade people have
come here for trade and so product has
moved around this area by boat these are
all like transporting goods boats where
they used to live on the boat they used
to cook on the boat they used to do
everything on the boat and go from place
to place delivering goods and
transporting goods around and now
continuing on to present-day where many
of the boats which used to transport
goods have now turned into complete
houseboats where you can stay where you
can cruise around the backwaters where
you can eat and where you can sleep and
just enjoy the gorgeous beauty of this
amazing place in Kerala otherworldly
